title: 图层分布路径形状高级控制AE脚本 Tweaks v1.2.3
author: 大众脸
content: 这是一个用于操纵复杂路径、形状和图层的综合工具包。能同时变形多个形状、进行复杂路径操作，处理繁重计算工作，助您专注创意细微差别，为After Effects创意探索开辟新途径，部分功能与PRIMITIVE SHAPES兼容。1.2.3版本更新内容为添加到方便粒子的偏移。

other.英文介绍: 30 features: Advanced control over paths, shapes, and layer distributions. From morphing shapes to fine-tuning paths and innovatively distributing layers, this tool will enrich your creative experience; with Tweaks, your artistic possibilities expand, limited only by your creativity.
